Rob Bowen Design Group has become a premier interior design resource to an exclusive and discerning list of international clientele.

Rob Bowen and his team create spaces that evoke a rare sense of intimacy and inspiration. Rob’s unique talents, keen insights and collaborative spirit transform personal and professional settings into a one-of-a-kind expression of each client’s vision and style, each as distinctive as the individuals they’re designed for.
